name: gen31
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wvd3(w0, w1, w2, wal(s0, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, wal(s0, w3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd3(w0, w1, w2, wal(s0, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, wal(s0, w3))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, wal(s0, w3))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd3(w0, w1, w2, wal(s0, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

|- wvd3(w0, w1, w2, wal(s0, w3))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)
-| wvd3(w0, w1, w2, w3)

comment: Virtual deduction generalizing rule for one quantifying variable and three virtual hypothesis. ~ gen31 is ~ ggen31 with virtual deductions. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 22-Jun-2012.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
